item.title: Meteorologists Say the National Weather Service Did Its Job in Texas
item.description: DOGE cut hundreds of jobs at the NWS, but experts who spoke to WIRED say the agency accurately predicted the state's weekend flood risk.

item.title: The 55 Best Deals From REI’s July 4 Outdoor Gear Sale (2025)
item.description: Whether you need a camp chair, sleeping pad, running shoes, or new pack, REI’s Independence Day sale has something for everyone.

item.title: Best Laptop Stands (2025): 25+ Models Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Get better posture, fewer back aches, and an ergonomic desk setup, thanks to these top laptop stands, mats, and risers.

item.title: Bose Soundlink Plus Review: Compromise Never Sounded So Good
item.description: Bose’s stylish new midsize speaker brings clear and punchy sound to the party.

item.title: Everything You Can Do in the Photoshop Mobile App
item.description: Adobe has launched a mobile Photoshop app for iPhone and Android. Here's what it offers.
